reporter_caption.center: IN RE T. L. S. AND M. J. C., Juveniles, 138 Vt. 640 (1980)

caption.center: IN RE T. L. S. AND M. J. C., Juveniles

opinion.posture: Appeal from District Court, Unit No. 6, Windsor Circuit.
opinion.opinion_text:
Appellant's motion to advance cause for hearing to the June Term, 1980, is granted in that the cause will be scheduled on the back-up calendar for the June Term, 1980.
Billings, J.
